recipeDescription: A great recipe to test our basic functionality!
ingredients1:
8 ounces all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting
1/2 ounce sugar
1 teaspoon kosher salt
8 ounces unsalted butter, cold
4 ounces cold tap water
ingredients2:
3 eggs
¾ cup sugar
½ t salt
¾ t ginger
1 ¼ t cinnamon
⅜ t nutmeg
⅜ t clove
1 ½ cups pumpkin
¾ cup evaporated milk (or 1 ¼ cups milk)
directions1:
Whisk flour, sugar, and salt together in a medium bowl.
Make the Layers.
Using as much flour as needed, roll one piece into a 14-inch circle.
